        public static java.lang.String join​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strings,
                                    java.lang.String separator)
        Utility method to join a list of strings
        Parameters:
        strings - the strings to join like a list of names
        separator - a separator (will not be added at the end) eg ", "
        Returns:
        eg: JP, Alex, PAUL, Pierre
